verses.verse: And when <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it <S%H2895>pleased<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> he <S%H1980>went<s%> not, as at other <S%H6471>times,<s%> to <S%H7125>seek<s%> for <S%H5172>enchantments,<s%> but he <S%H7896>set<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and he <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7931>abiding<s%> in his tents according to their <S%H7626>tribes;<s%> and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> on him.

And he <S%H5375>took<s%> up his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> has <S%H5002>said,<s%> and the <S%H1397>man<s%> whose <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H8365>open<s%> has <S%H5002>said:<s%>

He has <S%H5002>said,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H410>God,<s%> which <S%H2372>saw<s%> the <S%H4236>vision<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> <S%H5307>falling<s%> into a trance, but having his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H1540>open:<s%>
<S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H2896>goodly<s%> are your <S%H168>tents,<s%> O <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and your <S%H4908>tabernacles,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel!<s%>

As the <S%H5158>valleys<s%> are they <S%H5186>spread<s%> forth, as <S%H1593>gardens<s%> by the <S%H5104>river's<s%> side, as the trees of lign <S%H174>aloes<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5193>planted,<s%> and as <S%H730>cedar<s%> trees <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

He shall <S%H5140>pour<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> out of his <S%H1805>buckets,<s%> and his <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be in <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and his <S%H4428>king<s%> shall be <S%H7311>higher<s%> than <S%H90>Agag,<s%> and his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%H5375>exalted.<s%>

<S%H410>God<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> him <S%H4161>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> he has as it were the <S%H8443>strength<s%> of an <S%H7214>unicorn:<s%> he shall <S%H398>eat<s%> up the <S%H1471>nations<s%> his <S%H6862>enemies,<s%> and shall <S%H1633>break<s%> their <S%H6106>bones,<s%> and <S%H4272>pierce<s%> them through with his <S%H2671>arrows.<s%>

He <S%H3766>couched,<s%> he <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> as a <S%H738>lion,<s%> and as a <S%H3833>great<s%> <S%H3833>lion:<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H6965>stir<s%> him up? <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> is he that <S%H1288>blesses<s%> you, and <S%H779>cursed<s%> is he that <S%H779>curses<s%> you.

And <S%H1111>Balak's<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> and he <S%H5606>smote<s%> his <S%H3709>hands<s%> together: and <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1109>Balaam,<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> you to <S%H6895>curse<s%> my <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> you have altogether <S%H1288>blessed<s%> them <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> times.

Therefore <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H1272>flee<s%> you to your <S%H4725>place:<s%> I <S%H559>thought<s%> to <S%H3513>promote<s%> you to great <S%H3513>honor;<s%> but, <S%H2009>see,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H4513>kept<s%> you <S%H4513>back<s%> from <S%H3519>honor.<s%>

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1111>Balak,<s%> <S%H1696>Spoke<s%> I not <S%H1571>also<s%> to your <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H7971>sent<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> <S%H1111>Balak<s%> would <S%H5414>give<s%> me his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>beyond<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> either <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7451>bad<s%> of my own <S%H3820>mind;<s%> but <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said,<s%> that will I <S%H1696>speak?<s%>

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I <S%H1980>go<s%> to my <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H3212>come<s%> therefore, and I will <S%H3289>advertise<s%> you <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to your <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And he <S%H5375>took<s%> up his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor<s%> has <S%H5002>said,<s%> and the <S%H1397>man<s%> whose <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H8365>open<s%> has <S%H5002>said:<s%>

He has <S%H5002>said,<s%> which <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H410>God,<s%> and <S%H3045>knew<s%> the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H5945>High,<s%> which <S%H2372>saw<s%> the <S%H4236>vision<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> <S%H5307>falling<s%> into a trance, but having his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H1540>open:<s%>

I shall <S%H7200>see<s%> him, but not <S%H6258>now:<s%> I shall <S%H7789>behold<s%> him, but not <S%H7126>near:<s%> there shall <S%H1869>come<s%> a <S%H3556>Star<s%> out of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and a <S%H7626>Scepter<s%> shall <S%H6965>rise<s%> out of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and shall <S%H4272>smite<s%> the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and <S%H6979>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8352>Sheth.<s%>

And <S%H123>Edom<s%> shall be a <S%H3424>possession,<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> also shall be a <S%H3424>possession<s%> for his <S%H341>enemies;<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly.<s%>
Out of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H3381>come<s%> he that shall have <S%H7287>dominion,<s%> and shall <S%H6>destroy<s%> him that <S%H8300>remains<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And when he <S%H7200>looked<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H6002>Amalek,<s%> he <S%H5375>took<s%> up his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> was the <S%H7225>first<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> but his <S%H319>latter<s%> end shall be that he <S%H8>perish<s%> for <S%H5703>ever.<s%>

And he <S%H7200>looked<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7017>Kenites,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> up his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H386>Strong<s%> is your dwelling <S%H4186>place,<s%> and you <S%H7760>put<s%> your <S%H7064>nest<s%> in a <S%H5553>rock.<s%>
<S%H3588>Nevertheless<s%> <S%H518><s%> the <S%H7014>Kenite<s%> shall be <S%H1197>wasted,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H804>Asshur<s%> shall <S%H7617>carry<s%> you away <S%H7617>captive.<s%>
And he <S%H5375>took<s%> up his <S%H4912>parable,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H188>Alas,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%> when <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7760>does<s%> this!

And <S%H6716>ships<s%> shall come from the <S%H3027>coast<s%> of <S%H3794>Chittim,<s%> and shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H804>Asshur,<s%> and shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H5677>Eber,<s%> and he <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H8>perish<s%> for <S%H5703>ever.<s%>

And <S%H1109>Balaam<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up, and <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H4725>place:<s%> and <S%H1111>Balak<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> his <S%H1870>way.<s%>
